tool_description: Speech to text in 20+ languages, support files up to 1 hours long. Convert audio or video to text. Voice to text.
name: Speechy
title: Speechy

api_list.name: Convert Video/Audio To Text [ACCURATE]
api_list.description:
Convert any audio or video file to text with our most accurate model. 
Response time benchmarks:
- 5min audio -> 20 seconds
- 20min audio -> 2.5 minutes

api_list.name: Convert Video/Audio To Text [FASTER]
api_list.description:
Convert any audio or video file to text. It uses a lighter model, so it is faster.
Use this when:
- audio is crisp
- you want faster responses
